title: Cosmic Decor.
content:
Welcome to Cosmic Decor! Our website is dedicated to bringing the beauty of the cosmos into your home or office. 

We offer a wide range of products that feature stunning images of galaxies, nebulas, and other celestial bodies. From canvas prints to phone cases, our products are designed to showcase the majesty of the universe in all its glory.

Our team of designers carefully selects each image to ensure that it captures the essence of space and inspires wonder and awe. Whether you're a science enthusiast or simply appreciate the beauty of the cosmos, we have something for everyone.

Browse our collection today and discover the perfect piece of cosmic decor to elevate your space.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"An abstract image of a galaxy cluster, with swirling colors and patterns representing the vastness of space."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
